snippet: The United Nations refugee agency reported that 3,300 Syrian refugees crossed the Mediterranean and came ashore in southern Italy in the past 40 days.
abstract: United Nations refugee agency reports that 3,300 Syrian refugees have crossed Mediterranean into Italy, indicating that Europe is beginning to feel effects of refugee crisis that has already put severe stress on neighboring Middle Eastern countries.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations refugee agency reported that 3,300 Syrian refugees crossed the Mediterranean and came ashore in southern Italy in the past 40 days.

headline.main: Syrian Refugee Spillover Into Europe Surges
headline.print_headline: Syrian Refugee Spillover Into Europe Surges

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
